plotS: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

plotS: The Football Factory is more than just a study of the English obsession with football violence, its about men looking for armies to join, wars to fight and places to belong. A forgotten ...

In this world of stark contrasts and rigid laws the populace is kept in line and accounted for.

name: Tokyo Godfathers

plotS: In the underbelly of the Parisian criminal world, the Police are frustrated by a gang committing a series of violent robberies. Leo Vrinks and Denis Klein are two cops seeking promotion, ...

plotS: On a flight from Los Angeles to New York, Oliver and Emily make a connection, only to decide that they are poorly suited to be together. Over the next seven years, however, they are ...

plotS: A love story between two savants with Asperger's syndrome, a kind of autism, whose conditions sabotage their budding relationship.

name: The Onion Movie
plotS: Satirical interpretations of world events and curious human behavior.

name: Brick
plotS: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

name: Coach Carter
plotS: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

name: Earth
plotS: Feature-length version of the documentary TV series

name: Simon
plotS: Enterprising liberal Jew Simon Cohen is the lawless lord of an Amsterdam neighborhood, running a 'coffee' shop' (legal soft drugs sale). As soon as they bump into each-other, Simon ...

name: Crimen ferpecto
plotS: Rafael is the best salesman in the biggest department store of Madrid. He is a fascinating man; all his colleagues fell in love with him. He tries to live a high-standard life. He is ...

plotS: The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

name: The Producers
plotS: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

name: Eight Below
plotS: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

plotS: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: Samaria
plotS: Jae-Young is an amateur prostitute who sleeps with men while her best friend Yeo-Jin "manages" her, fixing dates, taking care of the money and making sure the coast is clear. When Jae-Young...

plotS: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: Rapunzel

name: Trade
plotS: Adriana is a 13-year-old girl from Mexico City whose kidnapping by sex traffickers sets in motion a desperate mission by her 17-year-old brother, Jorge, to save her. Trapped and terrified ...

name: Chaos
plotS: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

name: Nochnoy dozor

plotS: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

plotS: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: A Scanner Darkly

name: All the King's Men

name: Barfuss
plotS: Nick, a hedonistic bachelor, falls for an escaped mental patient.

name: Casshern

plotS: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space because of the board game they are playing.

name: The Guardian

name: Transamerica

name: War of the Worlds
plotS: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

name: Calvaire
plotS: A singer's car breaks down deep in the woods.

name: The Chronicles of Riddick: Dark Fury
plotS: This story opens with the new action hero and the two other survivors of Pitch Black already caught by a giant spaceship filled with dread. The sinewy leader has a unique--and creepy--jail ...

name: The Departed

name: Munich

name: Flightplan
plotS: A claustrophobic, Hitchcockian thriller. A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet the child vanishes and nobody admits she was ever on that plane.

name: Last Holiday
plotS: After she's diagnosed with a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to take a European vacation.

name: Les poupées russes
plotS: Five years after their summer together in Barcelona, Xavier, William, Wendy, Martine and Isabelle reunite.

name: Surveillance

name: Watchmen

name: L'ennemi public n°1
plotS: The story of notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine.

name: Little Manhattan

Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

plotS: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

name: Charlotte's Web

name: Pride & Prejudice
plotS: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

name: Banlieue 13

name: The Quiet

name: The Fountain

name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

name: Martian Child

name: Me and You and Everyone We Know
plotS: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

name: Mongol

What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

name: The Secret Life of Bees
plotS: set in South Carolina in 1964, this is the tale of Lily Owens a 14 year-old girl who is haunted by the memory of her late mother. To escape her lonely life and troubled relationship with ...

name: The Spiderwick Chronicles
plotS: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

name: Wolf Creek

name: Match Point

King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

name: Becoming Jane
plotS: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

name: Le temps qui reste
plotS: Romain is a very successful fashion photographer who's diagnosed with terminal cancer. He copes by being cruel and nasty to those he loves, until a visit with his grandmother changes his outlook. But, his boyfriend's moved out, now what?

name: Two for the Money

name: 9 rota

name: Factotum
plotS: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

plotS: Based on

name: Barfi!
plotS: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's norms of normal and abnormal.

name: Trouble with the Curve
plotS: An ailing baseball scout in his twilight years takes his daughter along for one last recruiting trip.

name: Hit and Run
plotS: Former getaway driver Charlie Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charlie's former gang chase them on the road.

name: Jagten
plotS: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Beasts of the Southern Wild
plotS: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

name: Searching for Sugar Man
plotS: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock 'n' roller, Rodriguez.

name: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
plotS: The Batman has returned after a 10-year absence. The Gotham authorities want to arrest him. An old foe wants a reunion. The Feds want the Man of Tomorrow to put a stop to him.

name: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
plotS: After finding and losing his true love in London, Samar Anand defies death by becoming a bomb disposal expert for the Indian Army. Returning to London after 10 years, he suffers amnesia after an accident. Will he be reunited with his love?

name: English Vinglish
plotS: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter everyday because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Thuppakki
plotS: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: OMG: Oh My God!
plotS: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

name: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
plotS: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?

name: Vicky Donor
plotS: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

name: CM101MMXI Fundamentals
plotS: The funny little details of everyday life; the simple things that makes us laugh. An unforgettable performance from Cem Yilmaz. Yilmaz captures the audience with his hilarious stories about...

name: TPB AFK: The Pirate Bay Away from Keyboard
plotS: An intellectual freedoms documentary based around the interpersonal triumphs, and defeats of the three main characters against the largest industry in the known universe. The media industry.
